name: Botbo n' the Hero (new)
description:
Descriptions:

Team up with your cute robot companion - Botbo, and be ready to go on a journey to save the world!

How to play:

Move with WASD or arrow keys.

Attack with Space.

To go to next level, both you and Botbo have to move all the way to the right, you could push Botbo to make him go faster.
